basics.label: Administrative Assistant
basics.summary: Highly focused and results-oriented professional who works with a sense of urgency to anticipate the needs of senior-level executives. Thrives in a fast paced, dynamic environment while supporting confidential, complex, and deadline-driven operations. Customer-oriented and computer-savvy.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Administrative Assistant to the President/CEO of statewide mental health organisation. Responsible for all medical transcription for approximately 10 doctors and therapists.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Assist the Senior Pastor in developing marketing programs realising a 6% increase in attendance over the previous year.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Reported directly to store owner providing retail pricing and in-house promotional work for entire store.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Provide secretarial and administrative support functions to various members of the Retail Leadership Team and their support staff.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Provide administrative and professional support to the Vice President & CIO and HR Director, Global Finance & IT along with 10+ members of the Global Leadership Team.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Team with Chief Human Resources Officer and the Senior Vice President, Global Sales and Marketing, providing administrative and professional support.
